mean_cn: vt. 装饰，修饰，润色；  vi. 装饰起来，加以润色
mean_en: to decorate (something) by adding special details and features :to make (something) more appealing or attractive
sentence: In India, girls embellish their hands for festive occasions.
sentence_trans: 在印度，女孩儿们给自己的手化妆来庆祝节日。
word_etyma: em进入 + bell美 + ish动词后缀 → embellish 装饰
